## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G17560](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G17560)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>BolA4</u>
- **Gene Name:** homolog of E.coli BolA 4
- **Description:**   BolA-like family protein;(source:Araport11)
